channel.title: I need to find a few good scripts
channel.description:
hello everyone,
i am new to the moparscape forums but i am starting to like it here already. It seems like a very nice and well mannered community and i would like to congratulate the founder/developer or this site and his/her staff for making such a good place. I am an administrator on a runescape cheating site, i will not advertise it because im not sure of the advertising rules in these forums (play it safe). but anyways, im here because i am looking for a few good scripts that work very well. i have already downloaded (overwritten) all of the includes in scar by opening the file menu then doing so.
so im pretty sure that i am good as far as includes go, what i need to know is do i have to maually put these includes into the scripts? or do the automatically work when i upload a script into scar to run it.
also, here are a few scripts that i need, i only want scripts that work well, i have wasted way to much time on scripts that do not work and they just wind up frustrating me. If i have to pay for a decent script then that is fine by me, i just need to get the money together. i need the following scripts:
air rune crafter willow cutter and banker autominer and banker also, any other rune crafter scripts that work well :)
also... if you have any other very well working scripts that you would like to talk to me about then i am always open for discussion. you can contact me at ltownsamurai@hotmai.com :cool:
one more thing, i know i look like a n33b for asking this but, whats SRL? lmao thanks
thank you for your time.
-your enemy

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

“well manared community” … well some people can hold it in…

item.title: I need to find a few good scripts
item.dc:creator: @your_enemy your enemy
item.description:
@your_enemy wrote:

ok, thanks alot

i do have the VERY BASIC knowledge of scripting.

just about as far as the tutorial goes that i read on this site, lol.

so, hopefully that will be enough

if not then i guess i need to start studying

thanks again, cya

Read full topic
item.source: I need to find a few good scripts

item.title: I need to find a few good scripts
item.dc:creator: @Gravey Gravey
item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

Ok, /me takes a deep breath…
Includes, if the script says it needs an include and you have that in your includes folder, you should be alright.
SRL is a giant include that pretty much covers everything you need, but is downloaded seperately, you can find the download somewhere on this forum.
As for the scripts, since most of the scripts in the scar runescape scripts section are either out of date or not working, you
could apply to get into the srl scripts section which has many good, working scripts, but you have to have basic knowledge of scripting to get into it.

Read full topic
